places_with_reviews.name: Baramati Club
address: Sayali hill, 5HFX+JV5, Bhigwan Road, Bhigwan Rd, Saily Nagar, Shiva Nagar, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: It was a good short overnight stay. Food is just ok. Don't expect too much. Rooms need Upkeep & Maintenance...

Baramati Club offers a luxurious blend of excellent food, inviting ambiance, and impeccable service. With a range of activities including a swimming pool and gym, it's the perfect destination for indulgence and leisure. Highly recommended for a truly memorable experience.

Staying at Baramati Club Hotel, and it was a fantastic experience from start to finish. The staff was incredibly welcoming and attentive, making sure every aspect of my stay was comfortable.

The rooms were clean, spacious, and tastefully decorated, providing a cozy retreat after a day of exploring Baramati. The hotel's amenities were impressive, including a well-maintained pool and a gym that allowed me to stick to my fitness routine.

What truly stood out was the exceptional service. The staff went above and beyond to cater to my needs, whether it was arranging transportation or providing recommendations for local attractions. The on-site restaurant offered a diverse menu with delicious options, satisfying my taste buds.

Hotel is good, rooms are specious. Staff is co operative. They serve food till 11 PM.
Location is a bit odd. No nearby market etc
Food was good.

We visited Baramati Club for official dinner party.. The pool, lighting and sound system for outdoor dinner seating was good.. so ambiance was very nice .. food was also very good.  Toilets are neglected or not clean hence 1 star less.. otherwise good experience..

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel City Inn
address: 5H8W+FJP, Bhigwan Road, Shiva Nagar, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text:
Excellent place in every aspect. The rooms were nice, spacious and aesthetically pleasing. Service was prompt, both in the restaurant as well as in room service. Food was delicious.
Parking was available and location was also good.
Really enjoyed.
The only issue was with the bathroom, where the fixtures need to be changed. The paint on the door was peeling off which needs to be addressed.
Otherwise, a really comfortable and enjoyable stay

3.5 of 5
There are no new hotels in baramati and you have dependency on city inn
Rooms needs a big screen
Better Toiletries
Cleaner rooms
Breakfast is average
The hotel is loosing it charm
Bakery is average
Street food is good
In room dining experience was not pleasant

The ambiance of the hotel is quite good. There is enough space for parking also. There are 2 sections one is fir tea and snacks and another one is for lunch and dinner. Both the segments are quite good. The breakfast ans snacks corner is quite good. The food quality and quantity is good enough. Taste of the food is awesome. We had wheat roti which was so soft. We loved the same.

The rooms are good.
WiFi is so week.
Their restaurant service is very slow you have to order at least १ hr before.
Limited options in complimentary breakfast.
They provide only one mineral water bottle per day.
Only thing is located in good area.
It took one hour just to make Maggie and there were finger stains of waiter on plate🤢🤢

places_with_reviews.name: Sitaram Lawns
address: Rui, Mhasobawadi Road, Sawal, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: Best atmosphere and nice garden . Beutiful place for photography.
Good for marriage n all type of events parking available in ample size
Good Place for Wedding as well as All functions.
Very attractive and very good looking function Hall in baramati.at. saval near Rui village.
Nice place for open air event
Big premises, sufficient parking. Easy approach. Rooms are average, need cleaning, Bathroom was not clean. Average amenities.
No attention towards the guests at all even service is also very bad. Will not recommend to anyone
Good place to stay and celebrate...having big parking area, seminar or party hall for 150 persons. The environment is also fresh, and this hotel is near Baramati Bhigwan Road.
A good hotel for budget freindly stay in Baramati. Service was also good
Worst hotel staff ever. Not friendly

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Krishnasagar
address: Baramati Bhigwan Road, Anand Nagar Colony, Ashok Nagar Colony, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: Located on the main road and so is easily accessible to all. Ample parking space is available. Rooms are neat, clean and well maintained. Room service is good. The restaurant is spacious and well maintained. Room Tarrif is moderate with complimentary breakfast. Food quality of breakfast was very good. Only one suggestion for the management is to remove  or hide all the cleansing material like mops bucket etc. kept just by the side of sitting in the restaurant.  it looks very shabby.

This vegetarian restaurant and hotel is easily one of the great places to stay and have food in Baramati. Conveniently located on Bhigwan road with ample parking space, the service you get here is also great.
Please follow for more honest google reviews.

Multiple times the food provided was stale and had pungent smell. The manager confirmed it too. Even after complaints they have audacity to serve stale food. Pathetic. Hope the hotel closes down. Anybody new here in Baramati, visit the hotel at your own risk.

Service is lethargic. People are slow and lazy. My room TV was not working so I called reception to sort it out. The guy did not turn up for almost 40 min. I had to call back. Still he took 15 min. After working on it for 20 min he was still not able to sort it out. He just left by saying "Recharge nahi hai". I asked for Curd rice with tadka. He only served curd rice without tadka. When asked; he just looked at me as if I asked him for his kidney. In the room where I stayed at 107, the colour of the window wall was really shabby. The bathroom shower does not have force. You have to wait till you get wet. They need to really get things corrected.

Nice hotel for stay and dine. Rooms are speciaus, service is good. Did not expected this level of luxury hotel at a place like BARAMATI. Ample parking is available. Only thing you need to instruct test of food as per your choice. Because some dishes are pretty chilly.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sudit Executive
address: Near swimming tank, Bhigwan Road, Pune(MS), Ambika Nagar, Pushpak Apartment, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: Food service is good but food quality is very bad

I have conducted get together here
Nice banquet hall for 70 to 80 persons
It has been a very bad place to visit...food quality is not good...please don't visit over here...
Good tasty food at a very slightly higher price.
Rooms are good but the toilet and bathroom are not maintained.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shree Abhishek
address: Bhigwan Rd, Saily Nagar, Shiva Nagar, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: Visited First time the Hotel for Lunch. Food quality was good. However Hotel needs to be upgraded in terms of Interior and furniture.

This a good Hotel located in Baramati. It's at the centre of the city and located quite close to major areas in Baramati.
Rooms are good and clean. Washrooms are clean as well. It's a family friendly hotel.
The hotel has a family restaurant as well as a Bar and restaurant. The food is good and room service is also available.
Towel and soap was provided.
Staff is helpful.
One improvement is that in the rooms that have window-ACs , the the ACs need to be maintained better. Also switches in the room are quite old, which need to be upgraded.
Overall,a good budget friendly hotel.

Rooms need to colour again as this impression makes the customer unhappy.....Also window AC and split AC room rate has a difference still Split AC making too much noise as that of Window AC.....   I will not prefer next time.When asked for a corporate discount ..... No discount was given.
Food quality ossam and best service
Good hotel, best service,very good food

places_with_reviews.name: The Royal Inn
address: Sikachi Icon, Niranjan Corner, Bhigwan Road, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: Good Quality Food and Service

Stayed in this hotel on 9th sep'23 for single night only. If you looking for the location then the location is fine.
There was a lady at the reception which after a negotiation offered us the 3500/- room at 2800/- with an extra mattress for our daughter.
there was no other person to bring the luggage from our car as the car was parked at basement and the reception was at 2nd floor, so we had to carry our luggage ourselves to the room.
Now comes the room.the room was very large, there was a king size bed, working TV and a kettle. complimentary water bottle we had to ask for. there was no coffee/tea/milk/sugar... you can only have warm water. bathroom was large but the glass panes on bathroom window was broken. luckily there was no other building near window so nobody can peep in.
restaurant part.... we preferred to order it in our room as we were tired. the hotel is not having their own restaurant and when we dialled room dining service we were told to call reception first then only they can serve us.
somehow we ordered the food.....french fries and chilli chicken. both were very tasty and very nicely presented. but there was condition that we have to settle the restaurant bill immediately and that too in cash. luckily we were carrying sufficient cash so this was settled.
I was a bit worried coz i was with family and i saw or heard no other person in that hotel. felt like all other rooms are not taken.
Also contact number available online was not working.
For a single person, hotel is ok, but with some extra money you can book city inn which is far better than this in every way.
My request to the management is please invest some money so that customer can have nice experience, you want to go otherwise.... you want customer first and with that money you want to improve... which cannot happen now a days.
All the best
t

Worst Restaurant experience. Had a very Horrible experience not once but twice. What an exceptional infra, beautiful interior, to Top it all scenic open roof open terrace view. But the serving staff is HORRIFIC. Very bad attitude. No one to talk to properly. No one to give proper answers. No manager to manage the chaos.

And the highest Irony was they can't serve Jain food when the owners are themselves Jain. Seriously.

Pleasant, soothing ambience.👌
Quality food 👌
Polite staff behaviour 👌
Room service for Tea or breakfast was not available. Hope they will improve it soon.

Below average Food and disappointing staff as well as service!!
Don't ruin your evenings here... Better opt for other restaurants.

After initial disappointing experience, thought to try it out hoping they might have improved their services. These people do not know how to handle and treat customers. Basic things like salad, water which are readily available will take 15-20 mins to reach your table after multiple reminders. Once they serve you what you have ordered, they wont bother to come and ask if you need anything else. Food quality was extremely pathetic. Veg Maratha gravy was tasteless watery tomato puree. Even a milkshake we ordered took approx 20-25 mins to reach our table.

Never visiting again!!

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel V Bharat Residency
address: 5H6R+MCC, MH SH 68, Shiva Nagar, Baramati, Maharashtra 413102, India

reviews.text: It was good and hygienic. I liked the rooms which were very spacious and clean. Services were quite slow but ambience and hygiene is best.

Warm and very welcoming staff. Excellent hotel as the rooms were very clean & spacious. The photos of the rooms shown are the exact rooms which you would get. I will surely stop by the next time I visit Baramati. Also would recommend this hotel. Thank you for your hospitality.
We went for Saturday evening dinner. Wow, beautiful serene ambiance. Decent food. Very spacious, nice location, quiet surroundings. Overall enjoyed the evening.
Awesome food. Specially chicken and mutton ran.
Food quality good special for fish and prons

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sunland Baramati
address: P/59, Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation Area, Baramati, Maharashtra 413133, India

reviews.text: Worst experience....No proper staff.  The restaurant is not working,Tv not working.

Decent place well decorated & spacious. Their menu is extensive inclusive of continental & Chinese alongside the Indian food.
The staff is courteous, attentive, need to improve grooming & uniforms.
Food is good tasty though we tried only Indian. Can't comment on the other cuisines.
The sofas need to be replaced by chairs, they are too low to have food at the table.
Wish them all the best!

I am only rating this for the ambience as this is a very good restaurant in a not so big area. The food was nothing special. Anything you order has this pickle kind of smell, which makes you feel if they use pickles instead of oil to fry.
The bar isn't that great either. Just that it looks good.

In need of a good chef,
Main course dishes should be improved.
Starters are above average...
Nice place to have booze...
Good seating arrangement...
Hope so a/c are repaired...
Bar setup is awesome than family dinnings...

This hotel is just fabulous, the food is amazing, the staff is very attentive, active, friendly and well trained. This place has also got wonderful banquet hall, separate meeting hall and a lawn.
The rooms are also up to the mark with beautiful interiors.
